name: The Oasis (KiGoRoMoUs)
description:
You find yourself alone in the desert, when you realize the heat is going to be your demise unless you find water fast! But be careful because guns require adapting for you to learn how to use them.

WASD to move and click to shoot.

This is my first jam and game ever, so please give me your honest opinions :D.

Everything was made in the timeframe except from the music which was obtained here: https://opengameart.org/content/5-chiptunes-action. Credits to the creator.
